pr_title: xds: report load stats for all clusters over a single LRS client

timeline.message: Bind each LoadStatsStore instance with cluster:eds_service.
An LoadReportClient instance should be responsible for reporting loads for all clusters.
An XdsClient instance should contain at most one LoadReportClient instance. All load reporting work should be delegated to the contained LoadReportClient instance.
Change EdsLoadBalancer to enable/disable load reporting with the new XdsClient APIs.

timeline.bodyText: It only works for the case cluster_service name is never changed, otherwise the first ClusterEndpointsBalancer.shutdown will cancel the second ClusterEndpointsBalancer's load report. It that intended behavior for now?
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

timeline.bodyText: This only works for the case cluster_service name is never changed, otherwise it will throw because of the graceful switch. It that intended behavior for now?
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

timeline.message: Do not support switching cluster_service, report loads per cluter only. Cluster_service field is never used.
